snippet.title: Sam & Max: Night of the Raving Dead
snippet.description:
Available now on XBLA, PSN, PC/Mac, and iOS!

XBLA: http://bit.ly/lvN8Cx
PSN: http://bit.ly/YHvpoN
PC/Mac: http://bit.ly/ikXUaL
iOS: http://bit.ly/13uDpiF


Sam & Max Season 2: Episode 3 - Night of the Raving Dead

Zombie attack! Droves of undead are converging in the streets. Now Sam & Max must confront their leader -- a Eurotrash vampire with a style all his own. Are the Freelance Police cool enough to outsmart this emo before his flesh-eating army usurps the western world?


Website: http://www.telltalegames.com/samandmax/nightoftheravingdead
Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/telltalegames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/telltalegames
